extracted_text: (6) Impervious coverage. Main and accessory buildings and other impervious cover shall not cover more than 45 percent of lot area on interior lots, and 50 percent of the lot area on corner lots.
llm_output.rationale: The section titled 'Area regulations' under the R-1 Single-Family Dwelling District provides the maximum impervious coverage for interior and corner lots, which is the closest information related to 'max_lot_coverage_pavement' for the C-2 General Commercial District within the provided text.
llm_output.answer: 45% for interior lots; 50% for corner lots
